entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 20, 15:00 UTC

Aug 30, 22:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/09/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Vmware] - R803R22
entry.content:
Sep 2, 21:20 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/09/2024 13:30 UTC
End Time : 02/09/2024 21:00 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 2, 19:22 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 2, 19:20 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Vmware offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the Functionality

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 02/09/2024 13:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in this rack are unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
